ch0019_10_yuki/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s have
another great day!
ch0019_10_yuki/0101_0701_02_10:
If you’ve ever got a problem, you can always
come talk to me!
ch0019_10_yuki/7101_0701_01_10:
Hey, what do you think of this sygna suit?
Personally, I love it! It’s so cool and stylish!
ch0019_10_yuki/7101_0701_02_10:
May even said it was a fresh new look for me
since I’m not wearing a hat!
ch0019_10_yuki/7102_0701_01_10:
Latios has the ability to make people see images
of what it has seen or imagines in its head.
ch0019_10_yuki/7102_0701_02_10: But my Latios is actually kinda shy.
ch0019_10_yuki/7102_0701_03_10:
Earlier he was acting so fidgety, I was wondering
what was up...
ch0019_10_yuki/7102_0701_04_10:
And it turned out he just wanted to tell me he was
hungry! Isn’t that cute?
ch0019_10_yuki/7103_0701_01_10: Apparently Latios doesn’t really like fighting.
ch0019_10_yuki/7103_0701_02_10:
I think that’s one of Latios’s strengths, actually.
He doesn’t battle for no reason.
ch0019_10_yuki/7103_0701_03_10:
I tend to rush straight into things myself, so the
two of us are a perfectly balanced team!
ch0019_10_yuki/7104_0701_01_10:
Latios has been with me since we traveled around
Hoenn together.
ch0019_10_yuki/7104_0701_02_10:
So I know his skills and strengths better
than anyone!
ch0019_10_yuki/7104_0701_03_10:
But when I told him that, he almost seemed
to blush!
ch0019_10_yuki/7105_0701_01_10:
Is there anywhere you want to go,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Latios and I can
take you!
ch0019_10_yuki/7105_0701_02_10:
Just about anywhere’s only a quick flight away if
we ride on Latios’s back!
ch0019_10_yuki/7105_0701_03_10:
You do have to be careful, though. Sometimes
Latios has so much fun flying, he gets a bit
carried away.
ch0019_10_yuki/7105_0701_04_10:
Then he’ll speed up so fast, he sends nearby
Pelipper spinning in his wake!
ch0019_10_yuki/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! Here, this is for you!
ch0019_10_yuki/1701_0702_01_10: Latios wanted to give you a present! Use it well!
ch0019_10_yuki/2501_0701_01_10: I went on a bike ride with May the other day.
ch0019_10_yuki/2501_0701_02_10:
My Latios was really happy that May brought
her Latias along with her.
ch0019_10_yuki/2501_0701_03_10:
While May and I were cycling, Latios and Latias
were flying in happy circles above us.
ch0019_10_yuki/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve made a lot of new friends since coming
to Pasio.
ch0019_10_yuki/2501_0702_02_10:
But it’s just as important to spend quality time with
old friends, too.
ch0019_10_yuki/2511_0701_01_10:
Apparently Latios will only become friendly with
those who have a compassionate spirit.
ch0019_10_yuki/2511_0701_02_10:
So I guess that must mean I’ve got a
compassionate spirit, right?
ch0019_10_yuki/2511_0701_03_10: Haha... I’m trying not to blush!
ch0019_10_yuki/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m pretty sure there’s an awful lot of
compassionate Trainers in the world.
ch0019_10_yuki/2511_0702_03_10: I’m so happy about that—and proud, too!
ch0019_10_yuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Me and my dad are gonna do some training
together today. Wanna come? We can help
each other get stronger!
ch0019_10_yuki/3003_0701_01_10:
I used to daydream about drifting through the
sky like a cloud... But did you know that clouds
actually move super fast?!
ch0019_10_yuki/3005_0701_01_10:
Phew... I think I’m gonna call it a day soon.
Time to rest up and get ready for more
adventures tomorrow!
